task.title: Remove a part
task.shortdesc: Parts can be easily removed if they are not needed. Some parts, namely the title and the body of the topic, are required and cannot be removed.

step.cmd: Find the part in the Guidance panel.
Remove any existing content in that part.
step.info: If you see a checkmark next to the part name, then you have content in that part that must be removed before you can remove the part itself.

step.cmd: From the Guidance panel, select the X for that part.
